rules.description: List of block rules evaluated on all blocks of a Structure Template. Block rules are evaluated in order. If a block rule succeeds and the output_state is set, the output_state block will be used as the input_predicate block for subsequent rules.

items.description: A block rule that is evaluated on all blocks of a Structure Template. All predicates must evaluate to true in order for a block to be replaced by the output_state.

3016468321.title: BlockRules

3034820683.description: Predicate that evaluates to true if the block at the specified location constains the tag.
